name: Vicky Vixen and the Temple of the Mole King
name_original: Vicky Vixen and the Temple of the Mole King
description: This is a game prototype developed by David Anderson and Kurtis Weaver for Degica's Indie Game Making Contest 2018.  The game follows Vicky Vixen through riverside cliffs as she dodges traps and finds treasure, all in a 3D-sidescrolling adventure.
